items.title: Exciting New Nano Banana Plugins Added in Dify üçå
items.summary: This update introduces the Nano Banana plugins, enhancing the Dify platform with new functionalities. Key additions include various plugin files, a comprehensive development guide, and privacy documentation. The changes aim to streamline plugin development and integration, providing users with a robust tool for experimentation.

items.title: Enhance OAuth Integration in Dify üöÄ
items.summary: This update introduces the capability to pass OAuth information to the frontend, enhancing user authentication processes. Key changes include the addition of a new OAuth initializer component and modifications to existing API controllers to support session management. The documentation has been updated to reflect these changes, ensuring clarity for future developers.

items.title: Boost Your Security with OAuth Support in Dify üöÄ
items.summary: This update introduces OAuth support, enhancing authentication options for users. Key changes include the addition of AceDataCloud as an OAuth provider, updates to the login and signup processes, and new tests to ensure functionality. Documentation has been updated to reflect these changes, making it easier for developers to implement OAuth in their applications.

items.title: Enhance Styles and UI Elements in Nexior üé®
items.summary: This update introduces significant style enhancements across various components in Nexior. Key changes include improved SCSS styles, updated UI elements in Info.vue, and refined markdown styles for better readability. These adjustments aim to enhance the overall user experience and visual appeal.

items.title: Enhance loading experience in Nexior üöÄ
items.summary: This update introduces a new loading index effect and modifies the HTML title to reflect the Nexior branding. Additionally, several CSS variables have been added to improve the loading aesthetics. These changes aim to enhance user experience during loading times.
